players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Charlie, Bob, what are your thoughts?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "I will not say anything, but I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. His accusation against me might have been a misdirection."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Diana? That seems like an odd choice for Night 1. I need to hear your reasoning before I can trust your claim."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob because Diana was a random first-night kill. I had no info on anyone, so I picked Bob. My investigation revealed he is mafia. Trust me, vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
